Package org.ambraproject.wombat.service.remote

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CacheDeserializer<S extends Closeable,T>
    How to convert a data stream into a cacheable value.
    ContentRepoService  
    FetchHtmlService  
    RemoteService<S extends Closeable>  
    SearchService
    Interface to the article search service for the application.
    SearchService.SearchCriterion
    Type representing some restriction on the desired search results--for instance, a date range, or a sort order.
    SoaService
    A service for retrieving data from the SOA's RESTful server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRemoteService<S extends Closeable>
    Superclass for service beans that make calls to remote APIs.
    AssetServiceResponse
    Encapsulates a response from a remote service that provides an asset.
    CachedRemoteService<S extends Closeable>
    Decorator class that adds caching capability to a wrapped RemoteService object.
    ContentRepoServiceImpl  
    JsonService
    Abstract class for services that query a ReST backend that returns JSON.
    ReaderService  
    SoaServiceImpl  
    SolrSearchService
    Implementation of SearchService that queries a solr backend.
    StoredHomepageService
    Retrieves stored blocks of homepage content from a remote service.
    StreamService  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SolrSearchService.SolrDateRange
    Enumerates date ranges to expose in the UI.
    SolrSearchService.SolrSortOrder
    Enumerates sort orders that we want to expose in the UI.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ServiceRequestException
    Indicates that a request from this webapp to the service component failed.
